name: ai-chat-md-export
description: CLI tool to convert ChatGPT and Claude chat history to Markdown

scripts.test:binary: bun run build && bun test tests/binary
scripts.test:coverage:html: bun test --coverage && lcov-viewer lcov coverage/lcov.info -o coverage/html
scripts.clean: rm -rf bun.lock node_modules releases dist coverage .*.bun-build tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.ci: bun run typecheck && bun run lint:check && bun run build && bun run test && bun run knip
scripts.example:chatgpt: echo 'Place your ChatGPT conversations.json in input/ then run: bun run src/cli.ts -i input/chatgpt-conversations.json -o output/ -f chatgpt'
scripts.example:claude: echo 'Place your Claude conversations.json in input/ then run: bun run src/cli.ts -i input/claude-conversations.json -o output/ -f claude'
scripts.demo:date-filter: bun run src/cli.ts -i tests/fixtures/chatgpt/multi-date.json --dry-run && bun run src/cli.ts -i tests/fixtures/chatgpt/multi-date.json --since 2024-01-01 --dry-run
scripts.demo:all: bun run demo:quiet && bun run demo:dry-run && bun run demo:search && bun run demo:search-no-match && bun run demo:combined && bun run demo:date-filter
